Class SuffixArrayBuilder

java.lang.Object
SuffixArrayBuilder
public class SuffixArrayBuilder extends Object
This class constructs and return a suffix array.
Version:
1.0 (8/1/2022).
Author:
Orazio Costanzo.

  • Constructor Details

    • SuffixArrayBuilder

      public SuffixArrayBuilder()

  • Method Details

    • buildSuffixArray

      public static SuffixArray buildSuffixArray(String text)
      Call Suffix.buildSuffixArray(text) to build a suffix array. Suffix.buildSuffixArray(text) ==> build(initialize(text). This method creates an integer array that contains the indexes of the sorted suffixes. Sorting algorithm from Arrays class.
      Parameters:
      text - The text on which to create the suffix array.
      Returns:
      return a SuffixArray object.
      See Also:
      • Arrays

    • setFilter

      public static void setFilter(String regex)
      Change the filter to be applied to the text before it is processed. Default filter is: \\s+|\\W. If there is an PatternSyntaxException , catch it and not change the filter.
      Parameters:
      regex - Regex that sets the new filter.ù

    • textCleaner

      public static String textCleaner(String text)
      Clean the text with specific filter, before processing it.
      Parameters:
      text - Raw text (without being processed)
      Returns:
      Returns the filtered text

    • setReplace

      public static void setReplace(String new_replace)
      This method replaces the filtered characters (via the regex) with a string. The default replacement string is "",(empty string),otherwise enter the new string to replace.
      Parameters:
      new_replace - New string to replace.
